intro.first_p: Hello, I'm Brayan Chavarro, a full stack developer, I could help your company with my problem solving skills and expertise in diferent frameworks and architectures.
intro.second_p: These are some projects I've worked on, webpages with react and nextjs, desktop apps with electron and mobile apps with react native and flutter, and diferent apis and microservices.
intro.third_p: Here you can find a list of my skills and technologies I've worked with, and some certifications I've earned.
